nodes.text: Thongla Jur was a male Anx Jedi Knight who was a senior member of the Jedi Order during the Clone Wars. Jur owned the R5-series astromech droid U9-C4, who was a member of D-Squad.

Thongla Jur first appeared as a background character in "Secret Weapons," the tenth episode in the fifth season of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series, becoming the first Anx to appear in the show. Jur was identified by name in the accompanying episode guide.
